## scrollV variable

Scrolls canvas vertically by `dy` lines. If `dy > 0` content moves upward, if `dy < 0` downward. The new empty space will be filled with `clear` char (default: ` `<!-- -->).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scrollV: (canvas: Canvas, dy: number, clear?: number) => void
```
